description: This component serves as the intelligent core of CodeBoarding, orchestrating LLM-driven analysis, generating context-aware prompts, and validating the LLM's outputs. It manages the central CodeBoardingAgent logic, prompt factories for various LLM models, structured data models for agent responses, and validation mechanisms to ensure analysis quality.

components.name: Orchestration Agent
components.description: Manages the overall code analysis workflow. This includes invoking LLMs, coordinating specialized analysis agents, handling tool interactions, classifying files, and managing retries and validation processes. It acts as the central control unit for the entire analysis pipeline.

components.name: Prompt Factory
components.description: Centralizes the generation and management of LLM prompts. It provides concrete prompt templates tailored for specific LLM providers (e.g., Claude, Gemini Flash, GPT) and an abstract interface for extensibility.

components.name: Structured Data Models
components.description: Defines standardized data structures for representing all analysis outputs, such as `AnalysisInsights`, `Component`, `Relation`, and `FileClassification`. This ensures consistency and interoperability of results across the subsystem.

components.name: Analysis Validation Engine
components.description: Ensures the quality, consistency, and correctness of analysis results. It performs validation against CFG data and predefined rules to provide feedback on the accuracy of the LLM-generated insights.

components.name: LLM Configuration Manager
components.description: Manages configuration details for various Large Language Models, including API keys, model names, and temperature settings. It abstracts away LLM provider-specific details.

components.name: Specialized Analysis Agents
components.description: A collection of agents (e.g., Details Analysis Agent, Abstraction Analysis Agent, Meta Analysis Agent, Planner Analysis Agent) that perform in-depth analysis of specific code clusters. They extract granular insights, identify higher-level components, gather project-level metadata, and develop overall analysis strategies.

components.name: Cluster Utilities
components.description: Provides reusable utility functions for cluster manipulation, such as assigning files to components, building cluster strings for LLM input, and creating strict component subgraphs.

components_relations.relation: Orchestration Agent delegates tasks to Specialized Analysis Agents.
Orchestration Agent utilizes LLM Configuration Manager.
Orchestration Agent requests prompts from Prompt Factory.
Orchestration Agent uses Structured Data Models.
Orchestration Agent submits results to Analysis Validation Engine.
Prompt Factory receives context from LLM Configuration Manager.
Prompt Factory provides queries to Specialized Analysis Agents.
Structured Data Models inform Analysis Validation Engine.
Specialized Analysis Agents utilize Cluster Utilities.
